data.title: Like the food and the service
data.text:
Used to go to the Dockside for many years, but hadn't been for a while.  Went back recently and the food was better than it used to be, they have more selection and it's not just bar food anymore.  Although they still have great appetizers and burgers.  

This place is not as busy as it was years ago, used to be so you couldn't find standing room.  But it still gets a good amount of customers.  They have nice cold draft beer and the service was pretty good.  Also like that they have Keno.

data.title: Why travel when you could try a Local Gem
data.text:
Well worth stopping by, the service was great with Steve and Carl on the bar. They were very attentive and assisted us in ordering a great meal. Could not believe our bill, it was so reasonable with all we eat and drank.

We will be back sooner than later, to try some of their promotions.

data.title: Great food great service
data.text: Great food great service food came out fast ... Everybody enjoyed what they ate and our waiter served us well.

data.title: Great food
data.text: I love going to the Dockside! It's a comfortable setting, love the food and the price! Great eats for little money

data.title: Good eats!
data.text: The remodel looks great!  Nice and clean in there now and the food is delicious! Great appetizers and the prices are very reasonable.

data.title: great place for banquets.
data.text: I held my cheerleading banquet here and everything was perfect.  The restaurant was able to accommodate my group of about 50 in the main dining room.  They provided me with extra tables to place awards and gifts on and even let me play a highlight DVD on the big screen TV.  A last minute request for a gluten-free meal was accommodated.  Great service also.  Ordered from their function menu and it was more than enough food.  We were provided with boxes so that the guests could take home leftovers.  Great experience overall and I will be back!

data.title: Excellent Family Value, nice big Bar
data.text:
Great family value in Malden, 
Menu choices for everyone. 
Lots of TV's, Keno
Full Bar and Fresh Popcorn !

data.title: Our server was excellent!
data.text: Definitely will be returning! The food is delicious and and server was great! She was very on top of everything!

data.title: Delicious
data.text: Dockside had a wide selection of foods which I like. The last couple of times that I went I was dieting and the staff was very flexible with making substitutions. They also have a lot of healthy dishes to choose from that are pointed out in the menu with symbols. You're nicely greeted as soon as you enter the place. The entrance and waiting area is a little small however the rest of the establishment is spacious and you're always welcome to wait at the bar where they offer freshly made popcorn...for free! I've been there several times and will return again.

data.title: Waitress are very friendly and so polite nice place to go for lunch and dinner
data.text: Enjoyed they also have wonderful selection of drinks wheather you are sitting at the bar or the tables

data.title: Dinner
data.text: Good place to eat and drink on a tight budget. The free popcorn is always popping and the drink specials always rotate for good choices. The menu ranges from pub fair to dinner specials like charred salmon. In addition there are arcade games/ dart area if you want an inside activity. Good for the family.

data.title: Beer and a Burger
data.text: Went out for a couple beers ($4/ea) at the bar, prices are good, Fridays are too crowded; it is better to go on Saturdays if you want a seat at the bar and some attention from the bar tender.  Dockside has approximately 10 beers on tap of usual fare.  We ordered several burgers to take home.  We  like the dockside burgers with onion, mushroom, and cheese with good fries and a reasonable bun.  At the end of the day, the Dockside is a reasonable place to go for reasonable food and reasonable prices.

data.title: Great value
data.text: Went on recommendation of a friend who lived nearby.  Food was good and price was right!  They have $6.99 lunch specials Monday through Friday that are an incredible deal.  Two of us had the chicken Parmesan over the pasta of our choice.  It was amble and yummy.

data.title: Long time customers no more
data.text: The Dockside in Malden recently acquired new waitstaff...I would not recommend going there....because the new servers will either ignore you (even after speakng to management about this and being told a server will come to your table), screw up your drink/meal orders, and argue with you about the bill at the end of your meal. My husband and I had (read this:  HAD) been loyal customers for 9 years.  But after the last two visits where we were ignored....it was embarrasing....we will never go back.  The food is not good enough to put up with such ignorance.  And management doesn't put their foot down til you are walking out the door.  There's better restaurants in the area that appreciate your business.

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your patronage over the past 9 years. I am very sorry to hear of your experience with the serving staff and would like to discuss this personally with you - please email me directly at LISA@docksiderestaurants.com. We have recently hired a new service manager to develop the team. I hope to hear from you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The food is just fine
data.text: And anything the food may lack is made up for by the enthusiasm of the management and staff to improve upon their products.  Here is a pub style restaurant that will adapt to many different dietary requirements with a smile on their faces.  From the moment you walk in, it's clear that these people are active in their community, as well, which, for me, makes for a more pleasant experience.  I highly recommend this place for a casual lunch or a burger dinner with the family.

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to visit the Dockside in Malden and for your great review on our service and community involvement. We truly appreciate your positive feedback and look forward to sharing it with our entire team. The Dockside at Centre Street has been involved in the Malden community for over 20 years and we are very fortunate to have such philanthropic guests that support our charitable endeavors. Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Typical (but not chain) Bar & Grill not far from airport
data.text: While looking for a bite to eat the night before an early morning flight, found the Dockside.  Food was good, portions big, and for me, it had the Buzztime Playmaker Trivia game.

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for visiting the Dockside in Malden and for sharing your compliments on our food, portions and atmosphere. We truly appreciate your patronage and feedback.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: delicious pub food
data.text: As a vegetarian I am often weary of sports restaurants because they typically don't have much for me. I was pleasantly surprised here with the options I had. Not the healthiest but certainly delicious. Good place to sit for a beer with friends.

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Many thanks for visiting the Dockside in Malden and for taking the time to compliment our menu and vegetarian options. We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to sharing it with our entire team. Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome place, thankfully for my husband and I it's up the street frome our home!!
data.text: Awesome Food, environment, service and plenty of parking!!! My husband and I go at least 2-3 times a week, he has had family get together, boys night for drinks and apps, and he doesn't know it yet but I'm planning on doing a Surprise Birthday Celebration for my husband in August and we have our favorite waitress to serve us, she gladly said it would be her pleasure.

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our Centre Street location. We appreciate your compliments on our food, service and atmosphere. Thank you for your loyalty to our restaurant - we look forward to celebrating your husband's birthday in August! Cheers.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Horrible!
data.text: The one in Chelsea was doing good, however they decided to close on the weekends at 1030 pm which forces us to go to the one in malden which is a train wreck. The management is pitiful. I went there with 12 people and we ate food and had a few alcoholic drinks. Our tab ended up being roughly 250 which is less than 25 dollars a person. The dining room got shut down, and since it was my birthday we decided to go to the bar. The manager told us that we were cut off due to a big tab after we even tipped our waitress more than generously. Meanwhile, while i was there the weekend before, there was a fight. As the guy was belligerent and trying to fight everyone our waitress says "that guy always does this when he comes here." So, the management thinks that 12 people that spend 20 a person on food and drinks and has a Designated driver, is too drunk, but they decide to constantly serve a local who always gets kicked out because the serve him to much. Horrible job, the place needs to be shutdown.

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello -

Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding our locations. Please accept my apologies for the miscommunication in the earlier closing hours in Chelsea. We had received guest comments to close earlier and have done such but will certainly take your comments into account. In regard to the bar service in Malden. All of our employees are certified in responsible alcohol service and follow this procedure strictly. Should you have questions about our procedure or if you would like to discuss this further please contact me directly at LISA@docksiderestaurants.com. Thank you
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, fun FOR EVERYONE !
data.text: This place has it all. Good food, Good atmosphere. TV's and sports, lottery and games. Give it a try, you'll like it....

owner_response.author: Lisa U, Owner at Dockside Restaurant, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for your fantastic review of the Dockside Restaurant in Malden. It is great to hear that you enjoy all that our restaurant has to offer: food, drinks and atmosphere. We appreciate your positive remarks and look forward to serving you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
